shows.title: The Apple Tree

shows.blurb: Three vignettes involving a woman who has to make a difficult choice

shows.title: The Story of My Life
shows.blurb: A successful author returns to his hometown to eulogize his childhood best friend

shows.title: Lysistrata Jones
shows.blurb: Aristophanes' classic story of a sex-strike to prevent war is reset and scaled down to tell the story of a sex-strike to get a college basketball team to win

shows.title: Carrie
shows.blurb: Based on the Stephen King novel about a high school girl with religious fanatic of a mother and some special powers
